title: Cosmic Portfolio
description: The immersive 3D experience you are exploring right now. Built with React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, TanStack Query, and custom WebGL shaders for high-performance interactive visuals.

title: VanLife
description: A full-stack van rental platform allowing users to explore and book travel vans. Powered by React Router for seamless navigation and Firebase for a real-time database and authentication system.

title: Chef Claude
description: An AI-powered culinary assistant that generates recipes from available ingredients. Developed using React.js with robust API fetching to communicate with LLMs.

title: KFC App
description: A pixel-perfect functional clone of the KFC interface. Built entirely with Vanilla JavaScript and CSS to master fundamental DOM manipulation and responsive layout techniques.

title: Legacy Portfolio
description: My previous developer portfolio. Built with standard React and CSS, it represents my journey in component-based architecture before migrating to WebGL-enhanced interfaces.
